++ Hydroponics Deep Water Culture (DWC)

+++ Summary

  Method of hydroponic plant growing.
  
  
  Each plant has: 
    - its own enclosed container 
    - constanly supplying air via an air pump.
    - constant submersion in nutrient water.


  - maximum yield because each plant has its own constant nutrient source, whereas HydroponicsEbbAndFlowFloodAndDrain only supplies them once a day


  - ideal for 
  
  - plants cant be transferred
  
  - must have an extra air/water pump. crops can die in 48 hours if pump fails.
